RECENTCASES: In {country}, the number of people who have tested positive for Covid-19 during the past 7 days is:
RECENTCASESEXPL: People who have recently become infected are the ones who can pass it on to others.
DUNKELZIFFER: This number only reflects confirmed infections. Reported deaths in {country} suggest that the true number of recent infections is {low} to {high} times as high.
RNOUGHT: On average, over the past 7 days, Covid-19's basic reproduction number in {country} has been approximately:
RNOUGHTEXPL: This means that the number of infections in {country} is {summary}.
PROJECTIONDISCLAIMER: It might take a while before this is reflected in the number of deaths, though.
DEATHPROJECTION: Over the past 30 days, {recentDeaths} people in {country} have died of Covid-19. If {country} remains on its current trajectory, expect to see {projectionPhrase} deaths from Covid-19 over the next 30 days.
